articles.author: Yaron Steinbuch
articles.title: Stranded Norwegian Cruise Lines passengers missed ship 'by more than an hour,' company claims - New York Post
articles.description: The six Americans and two Australian passengers who were stranded on an African island when a Norwegian Cruise Line ship sailed off without them had missed its departure time by over an hour, the c…
articles.content: The six Americans and two Australian passengers who were stranded on an African island when a Norwegian Cruise Line ship sailed off without them have now returned to the vessel to continue their Afri… [+3183 chars]
